/usr/bin/c++    -rdynamic CMakeFiles/bomberman.dir/src/BuildGame.cpp.o CMakeFiles/bomberman.dir/src/DisplayGame.cpp.o CMakeFiles/bomberman.dir/src/SoundMgr.cpp.o CMakeFiles/bomberman.dir/src/boom.cpp.o CMakeFiles/bomberman.dir/src/bot.cpp.o CMakeFiles/bomberman.dir/src/create_map.cpp.o CMakeFiles/bomberman.dir/src/event.cpp.o CMakeFiles/bomberman.dir/src/find_way.cpp.o CMakeFiles/bomberman.dir/src/game.cpp.o CMakeFiles/bomberman.dir/src/items.cpp.o CMakeFiles/bomberman.dir/src/items_bonus.cpp.o CMakeFiles/bomberman.dir/src/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/bomberman.dir/src/menu.cpp.o CMakeFiles/bomberman.dir/src/player.cpp.o  -o ../bomberman  -L/home/RICHAR_M/tek02/cpp_indie_studio/lib/linux -Wl,-rpath,/home/RICHAR_M/tek02/cpp_indie_studio/lib/linux -lIrrKlang -L./lib/linux -lIrrlicht -lX11 -lXxf86vm -lGL -pthread
